Socratic Seminar 131

14 Dec 2023 Link to Meetup

Announcements

START YOUR CAREER IN BITCOIN FOSS @ Chaincode Labs: APPLY NOW

Please join us for our next Socratic Seminar. A special thank you to our sponsors CardCoins, Chaincode Labs and Wolf NYC for food, refreshments and event space. If you can’t make it to the main event please join us at PUBKEY around 9:30PM.

Please note the addition of a new section, Delving Bitcoin. This forum has proven itself as a watering hole for high quality content and meaningful discussions.

Presentation

  • Pieter Wuille - Cluster Mempool

Network Data

  • Atomicals inscriptions filling mempool
  • Ethereum “builder” OFAC censorship reaches 80%
  • Ocean finds their first block
    • Coin Age prioritization, not including inscriptions, txs with op_return data >40 bytes being filtered, including whirlpool
  • Ordinal-style PSBT trades are currently using almost as much blockspace as fresh inscriptions.
  • ordpool.space
  • Runes (op_return) adoption increasing
  • Significant portion of hashrate sending funds to custodian?
  • State of the Network’s Q4 2023 Mining Data Special

CVEs and Research

Pull Requests and repo updates

Bitcoin Core

  • build: disable external-signer for Windows
  • wallet: skip BnB when SFFO is enabled
  • wallet: Pass through transaction locktime and preset input sequences and scripts to CreateTransaction
  • fuzz: p2p: Detect peer deadlocks
  • fuzz: Improve fuzzing stability for txorphan harness
  • net: Continuous ASMap health check
  • rpc: fix getrawtransaction segfault
  • script, assumeutxo: Enhance validations in utxo_snapshot.sh
  • Fee Estimator updates from Validation Interface/CScheduler thread
  • rpc: keep .cookie file if it was not generated
  • bugfix, Change up submitpackage results to return results for all transactions

rust-bitcoin

  • Fully encapsulate bitcoinconsensus
  • TaprootMerkleBranch improvements
  • Fix: TxOut::minimal_non_dust and Script::dust_value

libsecp

  • Add CONTRIBUTING.md
  • field: Remove x86_64 asm

Core Lightning

  • Implement is_some for cln_rpc::options::Value
  • coin_mvt: use the lightning_hrp for all coin movement currency

eclair

  • Dip into remote initiator reserve only for splices
  • Add a txOut field to our InteractiveTxBuilder.Input interface

LDK

  • Direct connect for OnionMessage sending
  • Route blinding: support forwarding as the intro node
  • Support receiving to multi-hop blinded paths
  • Refactor commitment broadcast to always go through OnchainTxHandler
  • Provide inbound HTLC preimages to the EcdsaChannelSigner

lnd

  • tlv: add new RecordT[T] utility type
  • neutrino remove sweeptx
  • multi: query chan update timestamps
  • rpc: add gettx command to walletrpc
  • routing: launch fetchFundingTx in goroutine so router can exit
